thread.title: Regional Housing Solutions to Receive $16K Grant
thread.title_full: Regional Housing Solutions to Receive $16K Grant - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Regional Housing Solutions to Receive $16K Grant
text:
Federal Home Loan Bank of Dallas
***Media Event, 3:15 p.m., Thursday, October 22***
FORT SMITH, Ark. , Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Regional Housing Solutions will be presented a $16,000 Partnership Grant Program (PGP) award today from Arvest Bank and the Federal Home Loan Bank of Dallas (FHLB Dallas). Regional Housing Solutions, a community housing development organization, plans to use the funds to build its organizational capacity to support large-scale housing developments.
The check presentation will take place at 3:15 p.m. Thursday, October 22, 2015 , at Arvest Tower, 5000 Rogers Avenue in Fort Smith, Arkansas . The media is encouraged to attend.
Presented annually, PGP awards provide grants up to $12,000 to community-based organizations (CBOs), like Regional Housing Solutions. The funds may be used for research, organizational capacity-building, grant- and funding-application assistance, or contractual services. The structure of the PGP allows FHLB Dallas member institutions, such as Arvest Bank , to make a contribution to a CBO, which FHLB Dallas will match. The member's contribution may range from $500 up to $4,000 and is matched at a 3:1 ratio. In 2015, FHLB Dallas awarded $225,000 in PGP funds to support 25 organizations. For more information, visit fhlb.com .
WHAT: Check Presentation
WHEN : 3:15 p.m. Thursday, October 22, 2015
WHO:
Beth Presley , Vice President & Marketing Director, Arvest Bank
Virgil Miller, Jr. , Group CRA Director, Arvest Bank
Karen Phillips , COO, Regional Housing Solutions & Advisory Council Member, FHLB Dallas
Bruce Hatton , Manager, Affordable Housing Program, FHLB Dallas
Michael Lambert , Government & Industry Liaison, FHLB Dallas
WHERE:
Arvest Tower
5000 Rogers Avenue
Fort Smith, AR 72903
CONTACT:
Corporate Communications
Federal Home Loan Bank of Dallas
www.fhlb.com
